Class HEM_Modifier

java.lang.Object
  wblut.hemesh.modifiers.HEM_Modifier
All Implemented Interfaces:
HE_Manipulator
Direct Known Subclasses:
HEM_Bend, HEM_ChamferCorners, HEM_ChamferEdges, HEM_Extrude, HEM_Lattice, HEM_MultiSlice, HEM_MultiSliceSurface, HEM_Noise, HEM_Skew, HEM_Slice, HEM_SliceSurface, HEM_Smooth, HEM_SmoothInset, HEM_Soapfilm, HEM_SphereInversion, HEM_Spherify, HEM_Stretch, HEM_Twist, HEM_VertexExpand, HEM_Wireframe
public abstract class HEM_Modifier
extends java.lang.Object
implements HE_Manipulator

Abstract base class for mesh modifications. Implementation should preserve mesh validity.

Author:
Frederik Vanhoutte (W:Blut)
